payload.content: The current AI application cycle represents the largest and fastest product shift in software history.

name: The current AI application cycle represents the largest and fastest product shif
content: The current AI application cycle represents the largest and fastest product shift in software history.

payload.content: AI adoption is translating into real enterprise usage and revenue, similar to prior platform waves like PCs, cloud, and mobile.

name: AI adoption is translating into real enterprise usage and revenue, similar to pr
content: AI adoption is translating into real enterprise usage and revenue, similar to prior platform waves like PCs, cloud, and mobile.

payload.content: Three core investment themes for AI applications are: existing software categories becoming AI-native, new categories where software directly replaces labor, and applications built around proprietary data and closed-loop workflows.

name: Three core investment themes for AI applications are: existing software categori
content: Three core investment themes for AI applications are: existing software categories becoming AI-native, new categories where software directly replaces labor, and applications built around proprietary data and closed-loop workflows.

payload.content: Defensibility, workflow ownership, and data moats are more critical than novelty for AI applications to scale.

name: Defensibility, workflow ownership, and data moats are more critical than novelty
content: Defensibility, workflow ownership, and data moats are more critical than novelty for AI applications to scale.
